Blizzard of Wishes!

“Blizzard of Wishes” is back again for the holidays! How does it work? Classroom teachers will be asked to share items that would help support their classroom. The ideas will range in price from $5-$20 and could include markers, craft materials, electric pencil sharpener, books, gift cards, etc. (The lists will differ depending upon what each individual teacher needs to help them create the best learning environment for their students!)

The “Blizzard of Wishes” ideas will be posted in your child’s cluster during the upcoming conference nights in November. The specialist teachers will have their wishes near the main office. Please look for the display and look through the list of wishes. If you find an item you would like to donate for a holiday gift, please take the slip of paper with you. You can deliver the classroom gift during the week of Dec. 16-20. After conferences, the “Blizzard of Wishes” will continue to be available until winter break, but will move to the main office. Thank you for considering this option as a holiday gift idea!
